Description: Postcard; printed; shows two vignettes of an Egyptian dancer and musicians in local dress, with a third scene showing and commemorating the opening of the Kasr el-Nil bridge.
Curator's comments: Postally used; postmarked Sidi Gaber, 1905. At this time, only the address was permitted on the back and the very limited space on the front only allowed the shortest of messages: "Dear Aunt, am still alright hoping all are the same at home, from A.H.". It is also signed Arthur.
